summary: An Ordinance providing for the purchase from Anna Burrowes Wagner and Thad Wagner, her husband, and Elizabeth Burrowes Gierin and E. F. Gierin, her husband, of a strip of land in the Northwest quarter (NW 1/4) of the Southwest quarter (SW 1/4) of the Northeast quarter (NE 1/4), of Section twenty-four (24), Township twenty-five (25) North, Range three (3) East, W. M., for park drive and boulevard purposes for the sum of One Hundred Sixty-three and 75/100 (163.75) Dollars; and providing for the payment thereof.
